thread.title: Xerox expecting third quarter loss

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Xerox expecting third quarter loss
text:
Xerox Corp. said it expects to post a loss in its latest quarter after taking a $385 million pretax charge due to incomplete government health care projects in California and Montana. The company said it expects a loss of between 3 and 5 cents a share for its third quarter, marking its first quarterly loss since 2010. In July, Xerox expected third-quarter earnings of 17 to 19 cents per share.
Adjusted earnings for the quarter, excluding the charge, would fall in line of 22 to 24 cents, according to Xerox. After tax, the company said the charge will total $240 million, or 22 cents a share.
Xerox is scheduled to report its latest quarterly results on Oct. 26. Shares were down less than a fraction of a percent on Tuesday to $10.41.
TCLAUSEN@Gannett.com
